overview: Displaying some of his dryest wit yet, our favourite Frenchman returns with his trademark deadpan delivery, bawdy poetry, and a live band to abuse. Masterfully playing the audience, Marcel is a Gallic symbol at the height of his Imperial phase. Sipping fine red wine and shrugging off Brexit with an insouciant song, join Lucont for some cutting comedic jazz.
title: Marcel Lucont - Numero Dix
